content.question: The Apollo 11 stones may have functioned as

choices.label: part of a more complex cycle of cave painting
a foundation stone for a religious structure
a grave marker for a successful hunter
an early form of portable art

content.answer: an early form of portable art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
